name: Martial
description: Your start with 1 Focus Point and your FP increases as shown in the Commandant Class Table. You also known Manuevers as shown in the table.

name: Bladed Proficiency
description: You are Proficient with Spears, Daggers, and Swords.

name: Pistoleer Proficiency
description: You are Proficienct with Flintlock Pistols.

name: Armor Proficiency
description: You are Proficient with Light Armor.

name: Commander's Focus
description: You regain half of your FP each time you grant a creature a Help Die.

name: Inspiring Presence
description: Whenenever your spend FP while in Combat, you gain a pool of HP equal to the FP spent. Choose a number of creatures (up to your Profiency Bonus) within 5 Spaces of you that can see or hear you, and divide the HP among them.

name: Commander's Call
description: You can spend 1 AP and 1 FP to command a willing creature that you can see within 5 Spaces of you that can also see or hear you. The chosen creature can immediately take 1 of the following Actions of your choice as a Reaction for free. You can only use each of the following commands once on each of your turns: \\n- Attack: The creature makes and Attack with ADV. They cannot spend any resources on this Attack, such as additional AP or FP. \\n - Dodge: The creature takes the Dodge Action. If they've already take the Dodge Action, they instead take the Full Dodge Action.

name: Natural Leader
description: You have ADV on Checks made to convince creatures that you are an authority figure. Additionally, you have ADV on the first Charisma Check made to interact with non-hostile members of military groups (such as soldiers, guards, etc.).

name: Commanding Aura
description: Youâ€™re surrounded by a 5 Space Aura. You can target any creature within your Aura to grant one of the following effects below, provided the target can see or hear you. \\n- Bolster: (1 AP) You take the Help Action to aid the target with an Attack. You can also do so as a Reaction whenever a valid target makes an Attack. \\n- Rally: (1 AP) You grant  a creature  Temp HP equal to your Proficiency Bonus.

name: Leadership Style
description: At level three you choose your subclass known as a Leadership Style.

name: Additional Feat
description: You gain access to 1 Feat of your choice.

name: Second Attack
description: When you make Attacks in Combat, you do not gain a level of DIS until after your 2nd Attack action during the same round.

name: Additional Commanding Aura
description: You gain the following command option for your Commander's Call:\\n- Inspire: You give the chosen create the Help Action.
